content: tiny barrel chair supplies d/3 25mm hook redheart super saver measures 2 across x 7/8 high to top of seat x 2 high to top of back for a larger chair go up a hook size or two for an even larger chair use larger hook and thicker yarn seat r1 mr6sc slip_stitch to join 6 r2 ch1 increase around slip_stitch to join 12 r3 ch1 single_crochet increase x6 slip_stitch to join 18 r4 ch1 sc2 increase x6 slip_stitch to join 24 r5 ch1 sc3 increase x6 slip_stitch to join 30 r6 ch1 blo single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 30 r7-8 ch1 single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 30 r9 ch1 blo sc3 decrease x6 slip_stitch to join 24 r10 ch1 sc2 decrease x6 slip_stitch to join 18 r11 ch1 single_crochet decrease x6 slip_stitch to join 12 ~ stuff lightly ~ r12 ch1 decrease around slip_stitch to join 6 fasten_off leaving a short tail to sew the hole closed by picking up the flo and cinching closed then weave in your tail back join yarn to any one of the left over loops from r9 and working in row r1 single_crochet x20 ch1 turn 20 r2-3 single_crochet ch1 turn 20 r4 decrease single_crochet x16 decrease ch1 turn 18 r5 single_crochet across ch1 turn 18 r6 decrease single_crochet x14 decrease ch1 turn 16 ~ this last row will be worked as a round ~ r7 single_crochet 15 3sc in last st rotate and working down the edge single_crochet x5 rotate slip_stitch across the front x10 rotate and working up the edge single_crochet x5 single_crochet x2 in space as first st fasten_off using an invisible join 40 this pattern is the property of carrey reynolds @ mixedkreationsdesigns this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed finished products created with this pattern may be sold it is appreciated if you give design credit to mixedkreations if you have any questions or need help don t hesitate to contact me ravelrypm-mixedkreations -
